metadata.title: CVE-2022-42920 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Commons BCEL has a number of APIs that would normally only allowchanging specific class characteristics. However, due to an out-of-boundswriting issue, these APIs can be used to produce arbitrary bytecode. Thiscould be abused in applications that pass attacker-controllable data tothose APIs, giving the attacker more control over the resulting bytecodethan otherwise expected. Update to Apache Commons BCEL 6.6.0.

criterions.comment: bcel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
